00022 InstrumentListEditor::InstrumentListEditor(QWidget* parent)
00023    : InstrumentListEditorBase(parent)
00024       {
00025       ilist->setSorting(-1);  // do not sort
00026       updateAll();
00027       }

00033 void InstrumentListEditor::updateAll()
00034       {
00035 #if 0
00036       InstrumentList* il = cp->instruments();
00037       ilist->clear();
00038       ilist->setSorting(-1);
00039       ilist->setAllColumnsShowFocus(true);
00040 
00041       QString s;
00042       for (iInstrument ii = il->begin(); ii != il->end(); ++ii) {
00043             Instrument* i = *ii;
00044             Q3ListViewItem* item = new Q3ListViewItem(ilist, i->trackName());
00045             item->setText(I_LONGNAME,  i->longName());
00046             item->setText(I_SHORTNAME, i->shortName());
00047             item->setText(I_MUTE,      s.setNum(i->mute()));
00048             item->setText(I_SOLO,      s.setNum(i->solo()));
00049             item->setText(I_SHOW,      s.setNum(i->show()));
00050             item->setText(I_CHANNEL,   s.setNum(i->midiChannel()));
00051             item->setText(I_PROGRAM,   s.setNum(i->midiProgram()));
00052             item->setText(I_VOL,       s.setNum(i->volume()));
00053             item->setText(I_PAN,       s.setNum(i->pan()));
00054             item->setText(I_REVERB,    s.setNum(i->reverb()));
00055             item->setText(I_CHORUS,    s.setNum(i->chorus()));
00056             item->setText(I_MIN_PITCH,  s.setNum(i->minPitch()));
00057             item->setText(I_MAX_PITCH,  s.setNum(i->maxPitch()));
00058             }
00059 #endif
00060       }

00062 //---------------------------------------------------------
00063 //   startInstrumentEditor
00064 //---------------------------------------------------------
00065 
00066 void MuseScore::startInstrumentListEditor()
00067       {
00068       if (iledit == 0)
00069             iledit = new InstrumentListEditor(0);
00070       else
00071             iledit->updateAll();
00072       iledit->show();
00073       }
